page.title: 10Living in Crediton
page.content: Crediton on the whole is very {friendly.}We know nearly everyone living here, and when someone new moves in we soon get to know them. In the winter at{Christmas}time the {girl pilots}go{carol singing}around Crediton and collect money for different charities. Afterwards we all go back to my house for mince pies, soup, punch, tea and biscuits. {In the street,}when we meet, a ten minute shopping trip can turn into a two hour shopping trip. After school quite a few girls go {dancing}at Catherine Holland's School of Dancing at The Red House. Catherine Holland does six different types of dancing: Jane Fonda, Modern, Tap, Ballet, Aerobics and Keep-fit. Nearly every week there is some kind of{fete or coffee morning}somewhere in the town.
